oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Peuhôr, son of Esmîn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Legal documents
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Teihor, the legatee of Pleehe, sells the house which forms the chief item in Demotic Papyrus 11 to another woman, Teiant (?). The text is a list of the witnesses, followed by the sale and six witness copies. Demotic Papyrus 12 is the agreement for the sale, Demotic Papyrus 13 is the cession. In a separate document, Demotic Papyrus 14, the father of Teihor likewise makes a cession of the house to the same woman.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agreement for Sale of Property
